item.title: The golang programming language
item.description: Notes Section 2, Program Structure nested block in if-else if-else block if x, y := 100, 200; x > 1000 { } else if x := "hello"; y > 0 { //this x shadow the 'x' in if fmt.Println(x, y) } scope shaw issue var cwd string func init() { cwd, err := os.Getwd() //compile error: the 'cwd' declared but not used if err != nil { log.Fatalf("os.Getwd failed: %v",
